productShortDesc: Provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection and helps prevent photoaging. Light, fluid texture. Does not leave white cast. Formulated with mineral and organic filters. 82% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.
productIngredients:
Mineral filter:
Protects the skin from UV rays by forming a physical protective barrier on the skin's surface that reflects solar radiation. The mineral filter used in this cream is TITANIUM DIOXIDE without nanoparticles. It stays on the surface of the skin and offers overall UVA and UVB protection. It also has mattifying properties.
DISODIUM PHENYL DIBENZIMIDAZOLE TETRASULFONATE:
provides protection against UVA radiation.
ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE:
protects against UVB radiation.
DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE:
provides UVA protection and neutralizes free radicals generated during sun exposure.
BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE:
offers broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection.
